posts.post_text: December 5, 2022 at 12:53 PM#3you use canbus for thisexample:macro line 1lua 'gma.canbus.hardkey("42", true, false)'macro line 2lua 'gma.canbus.hardkey("42", false, false)'and it will act as a toggle for holding the select key.
